full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DGA' LDAN LHA BRGYA MA'I MJUG TU 'DON RGYU'I SMON LAM DE LTAR MKHA' DBYINGS MA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004A *, ,(CES DGA' LDAN LHA BRGYA MA'I MJUG TU 'DON RGYU'I 'DOD GSOL SMON LAM 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES DGA' BCU SMRA BA BLO BZANG RIN CHEN DANG, ,CHOS MDZOD 'JAM DBYANG DBANG PHYUG DANG, SKYOR DPON RAB 'BYAMS BLO BZANG SBYIN PA, DRUNG YIG PA DGE SLONG BSOD NAMS PHUN TSOGS, DGE SLONG NAMS PHUN MA MKHA' DON GRUB RNAMS KYIS NAN TAN CHEN POS GSOL BA BTAB PA'I NGOR, SH'AKYA'I DGE SLONG ZHVA SER CONG PAn 'DZIN PA DKON MCHOG 'JIGS MED DBANG PO YE SHES BRTZON 'GRUS GRAGS PA'I SDES CHOS GRVA CHEN PO BRKA SHIS 'KHYIL DU SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI BSKUL BA PO DRUNG YIG DGE SLONG BSOD NAMS PHUN TSOGS SO,, ,,)
author_simple: DKON MCHOG 'JIGS MED DBANG PO YE SHES BRTZON 'GRUS GRAGS PA,
